data.title: The 4 best eco hotels in Yekaterinburg
meta_keywords: Most eco friendly hotel in Yekaterinburg
Most eco friendly hotels in Yekaterinburg
data.meta_description: The 4 most eco-friendly hotels in Yekaterinburg based on the latest emissions data
data.text:
If you're travelling to Yekaterinburg and want to make your trip as sustainable as possible, then choosing a more eco-friendly hotel can reduce your footprint below the 23.2 kg CO2 local average emissions per night.

We've calculated the CO2 footprint of 4 hotels in Yekaterinburg using multiple live data sources and an approach based on academic research to help you reduce the carbon footprint of your trip.

Here are the 4 most eco friendly hotels in Yekaterinburg based on the latest data on Staze.

Officially the best eco hotel in Yekaterinburg

Ramada Hotel and Spa Yekaterinburg

Ramada Hotel and Spa Yekaterinburg has the lowest carbon footprint per night booked. They have reduced their energy usage and taken more energy from lower carbon sources, meaning that they are leading the way on sustainability in Yekaterinburg.

Book now

The hotel where luxury meets sustainability

Hyatt Regency Ekaterinburg

Hyatt Regency Ekaterinburg is not only an impressive place to stay, it is also a leader when it comes to sustainability. Hyatt Regency Ekaterinburg is going further than any other five star hotel on the issue of climate and are making a conscious effort to reduce the energy intensity of staying there.

Book now

Sustainable 4 star hotel in Yekaterinburg

Novotel Yekaterinburg Centre

Novotel Yekaterinburg Centre have the smallest footprint of all 4 star hotels in Yekaterinburg, so if you're looking for a comfortable, luxurious yet sustainable stay then we'd recommend it!

Book now

Best green hotel for away-from-home workouts

Four Elements Ekaterinburg (ex DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Ekaterinburg City Centre)

Look after your body and the planet by visiting the gym at Four Elements Ekaterinburg (ex DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Ekaterinburg City Centre). They're a great sustainable option for travellers that want to be able to exercise at their hotel.

Book now

Even with eco tourism booming, eco-friendly accommodation can be hard to come by. For more of the best sustainable hotels in Yekaterinburg and across the world, browse Staze.

Booking any of these eco-friendly hotels in Yekaterinburg still creates a carbon footprint, if you book with Staze then we'll double offset your carbon footprint for free so your trip has a positive impact on the climate.
